page.title: 12Wem Sports and Social Club 2
page.content: The rec. has 4 tennis courts, a big football field and a bowling green that may soon be converted to a B.M.X. course. The football pitch can be hired for Â£6.50 a match. It is usually used by Young Farmers Clubs.There are also circuses and fairs that use the rec. There is a play area with swings, slides and a fort for young children. Mr.Taylor looks after both the Bowen's Field and rec. sites. He is employed by the Wem Sports and Social Club. Each sports club affiliated to the Wem Sports and Social Club pays Â£26 per year. The cost for individual members is Â£1.50 a year.There are also grants from the Town Council and North Shropshire District Council, and money from various sporting bodies like the Sports Council. The Sports and Social Club thus plays a very important part in the life of many local people.
